attributes.action: Prevent anyone working for those banks propped up with public money from receiving a bonus of any kind
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The executives and some of their employees are guilty of bringing on the financial mess this country finds itself in. While these banks are supported with public money it would be an insult to the taxpayers if anyone were allowed to be paid a bonus. The money is there to protect the bank not the bankers' earnings, and would be analogous to benefit fraud.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
